```{r}
#install.packages("sf")
#install.packages("tmap")
#install.packages("tmaptools")
#install.packages("leaflet")

library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
newscensus <- nc_ecosystem
counties <- NC_Counties
```

```{r}
#counties <- rename(counties, county = "CO_NAME")
  
counties <- counties %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))
newscensus <- newscensus %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))
 map_and_data <- inner_join(counties, newscensus)
```

```{r}
install.packages("usmaps")
```

```{r}
str(map_and_data)

map_and_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=long, y=lat))
#ggplot(map_and_data) + 
  #geom_sf(aes(fill = ))
```
